Package com.g1.mychess.tournament.repository

Interface TournamentRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Tournament,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Tournament,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Tournament,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Tournament,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Tournament,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Tournament>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Tournament,Long>
@Repository public interface TournamentRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Tournament,Long>
Repository interface for accessing Tournament entities. Provides CRUD operations and custom queries related to tournaments.

    • findByRegistrationStartDateBeforeAndStatus

      List<Tournament> findByRegistrationStartDateBeforeAndStatus(LocalDateTime dateTime, Tournament.TournamentStatus status)
      Finds all tournaments where the registration start date is before the specified date and the tournament status matches the provided status.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - the date to compare the registration start date against
      status - the tournament status to filter by
      Returns:
      a list of Tournaments that match the criteria

    • findByStartDateTimeAfterOrderByStartDateTimeAsc

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Tournament> findByStartDateTimeAfterOrderByStartDateTimeAsc(LocalDateTime date, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds tournaments that start after the specified date and returns them in ascending order of their start time.

      date - the date to compare the start time against
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page of Tournaments starting after the specified date

    • findAllByOrderByStartDateTimeAsc

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Tournament> findAllByOrderByStartDateTimeAsc(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds all tournaments and returns them in ascending order of their start time.
      Parameters:
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a Page of all Tournaments ordered by start date
